CmdLine: set -x     && apk update     && apk add --upgrade apache2-ssl     && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -x     && sed -i 's/^#LoadModule ssl_module modules\/mod_ssl.so/LoadModule ssl_module modules\/mod_ssl.so/' conf/httpd.conf     && sed -i 's/^#LoadModule rewrite_module modules\/mod_rewrite.so/LoadModule rewrite_module modules\/mod_rewrite.so/' conf/httpd.conf     && sed -i 's/^#LoadModule proxy_module/LoadModule proxy_module/' conf/httpd.conf     && sed -i 's/^#LoadModule proxy_http_module/LoadModule proxy_http_module/' conf/httpd.conf
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -x     && sed -i 's/^ServerAdmin you@example.com/ServerAdmin sysadmin@wt6.ephec-ti.com/' conf/httpd.conf     && sed -i 's/^#Include conf\/extra\/httpd-vhosts.conf/IncludeOptional conf\/vhosts\/*.conf/' conf/httpd.conf     && mkdir conf/vhosts
Commands.Name: run
